page.title: 14BRISTOL WHITELADIES ROAD
page.content: {Whiteladies Road}is the busy main road leading north from the city to the {Downs}. There is usually a lot of traffic,with queues at rush hour and many pedestrians . It starts by the { {Victoria Rooms }, which used to be Bristol's main concert hall and goes by lots of offices including the BBC . The nearby streets are mainly residential . Then you start to see mainly shops . There is a really good variety and you can buy almost any thing . Near the station is a brand new shopping precinct with a big super market . We found most people did much of their shopping there but also used smaller shops for things like bread and vegetables . There are several restaurants including Indian , Chinese and Greek , and plenty of take away food places .
